document_data.mainbody:
he Sunrise Mountains, also known as the Taurax Mountains,This alternative name seems to appear only in The Great Glacier (1992), so it could be reasonably inferred that this is the Sunrise Mounatins name in the Ulutiun language. were a mountain range in the far Moonsea North.
The Sunrise Mountains lay north of the Frozen Forest and the Great Mount of Ghaethluntar, situated between the High Ice of the Anauroch to the west and the Great Glacier to the east. It was the furthest north mountain range in the region.
In the , the Sunrise Mountains served as the northern border of the Tyrantfog that spread out from Zhentil Keep.
